title: 387 6 "The Fated Reunion! Save the Imprisoned Fish-man"Transliteration: "Innen no Saikai! Toraware no Gyojin o Sukuidase" (Japanese:因縁の再会! 囚われの魚人を救い出せ) Yukihiko Nakao Tsuyoshi Sakurai February 1, 2009(2009-02-01)[13][16] —
transformers_text: 387 6 The Fated Reunion Save the Imprisoned Fish man Transliteration In nen no Sai kai To raw are no Gy oj in o Suk u ida se Japanese Yuki hi ko Nakao Tsuyoshi Sakurai February 1 2009 2009 02 01 13 16 The Straw Hats arrive at Duval's base noticing how quiet it is They then find C amie's fish man friend in a cage only to recognize him as Hatch an a former member of Ar long's crew Luffy refuses to help him so C amie and Papp a gu try to rescue their friend on their own but are quickly captured by Macro Fish men Pirates The Straw Hats then decide to help only to spring the trap Duval had planned for them
tf_idf_text: fat reunion save imprison fish man transliteration nen sai kai raw suk ida japanese yuki nakao tsuyoshi sakurai february straw hat arrive duvals base notice quiet find amies fish man friend cage recognize hatch former member longs crew luffy refuse help amie papp try rescue friend quickly capture macro fish men pirate straw hat decide help spring trap duval plan
